info.title: [NEW] Course Information – API for course memos
info.description: API that supports the new administraion site that makes it possible to create and manage course memos.

get.summary: GET a test endpoint that is protected by api key to validate that consumer has a proper api key

get.description: Gets some form of data that only requires read access for testing

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of data to get

post.summary: Saves an object in the database for test
post.description: Saves changes to an object in the database for test

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the data to save

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to save

post.summary: Admin page: create new (empty with default values /  or copied from any published version(anotherMemoEndPoint)) draft and assign memoEndPoint to it
post.description: Creates a copy of published memo and save it as a draft with memoEndPoint in parameter anotherMemoEndPoint, if anotherMemoEndPoint==memoEndPoint, it will create empty standard draft or or copy from prev published version with the same memoEndPoint

parameters.name: memoEndPoint
parameters.description: memoEndPoint is used to keep all versions under the same endpoint, unique for memo for one kursomgång. Unchangeable enpoint to display it in url (for bookmarks) and keep track on versions change

parameters.name: anotherMemoEndPoint
parameters.description: anotherMemoEndPoint is memoEndPoint for previously published memo which will be copied into this new memo

parameters.name: roundCourseMemoData
parameters.description: Data with course code, semester and rounds to create first draft

get.summary: Get published course memo document descriptive data by its endpoint memoEndPoint
get.description: For admin pages often need to access draft version of memo to edit it before publishing

parameters.name: memoEndPoint
parameters.description: memoEndPoint is used to keep all versions under the same endpoint, unique for memo for one kursomgång. Unchangeable enpoint to display it in url (for bookmarks) and keep track on versions change

put.summary: The draft is already in database. Update some of its properties, f.e., only text for examinations, for fast and often update
put.description: Saves a course memo document descriptive data in the database per course and term, and per chosen {key: value}

parameters.name: memoEndPoint
parameters.description: memoEndPoint is used to keep all versions under the same endpoint, unique for memo for one kursomgång. Unchangeable enpoint to display it in url (for bookmarks) and keep track on versions change

parameters.name: roundCourseMemoData
parameters.description: Data with course code, semester and rounds to create first draft

post.summary: Admin page: create new (empty with default values /  or copied from published version) draft and assign memoEndPoint to it
post.description: Creates a copy of published memo and save it as a draft or creates a new empty draft with default values

parameters.name: memoEndPoint
parameters.description: memoEndPoint is used to keep all versions under the same endpoint, unique for memo for one kursomgång. Unchangeable enpoint to display it in url (for bookmarks) and keep track on versions change

parameters.name: roundCourseMemoData
parameters.description: Data with course code, semester and rounds to create first draft

delete.summary: Delete a course memo draft by memoEndPoint
delete.description: Delete draft for course memo with sent memoEndPoint

parameters.name: memoEndPoint
parameters.description: memoEndPoint of the memo draft to delete course memo data

get.summary: Get all course memos documents fetched by this course code and type of status, only published, or draft, or old
get.description: Gets some form of data that only requires read access

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: Course code, ex, SF1624

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: published / draft / old

get.summary: Get published course memo document descriptive data by its endpoint memoEndPoint
get.description: Get a memo which exists in database and has memoEndPoint which identify unique memo

parameters.name: memoEndPoint
parameters.description: memoEndPoint is used to keep all versions under the same endpoint, unique for memo for one kursomgång. Unchangeable enpoint to display it in url (for bookmarks) and keep track on versions change

post.summary: Saves an object of one course memo document descriptive data in the database per course and term, f.e, SF1624 and 20191
post.description: Saves a course memo document descriptive data in the database per course and term

parameters.name: memoEndPoint
parameters.description: memoEndPoint is used to keep all versions under the same endpoint, unique for memo for one kursomgång. Unchangeable enpoint to display it in url (for bookmarks) and keep track on versions change

parameters.name: roundCourseMemoData
parameters.description: Array with memo data objects

get.summary: Get a list of course memos stored as pdf files (integrated from kurs-pm-api) used by kursinfo-web
get.description: Gets course memos for rounds in a course. Memos stored as pdfs in kursinfo storage (not generated)

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: Id of the course code

parameters.name: semester
parameters.description: Semester code, five numbers as a string (year + 1 (spring) or 2 (fall). Filter so the result only has memo data from that semester and all subsequent semesters

400.description: Bad Request, something with the request is invalid

404.description: No organization or user matched the Ids

get.summary: Get a list of course memos stored as pdf files (integrated from kurs-pm-api) AND as web-based versions used by kurs-pm-web 'About memo'
get.description: Gets both solutions of course memos for a course. Memos stored as pdfs in kursinfo storage (not generated) and as a html version (kurs-pm-data)

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: Id of the course code

400.description: Bad Request, something with the request is invalid

404.description: No organization or user matched the Ids

get.summary: Get a list of course memos for a chosen semester stored as pdf files (integrated from kurs-pm-api) AND as web-based versions used by kursinfo-admin-web 'About memo' statistic
get.description: Gets both solutions of course memos for a chosen semester. Memos stored as pdfs in kursinfo storage (not generated) and as a html version (kurs-pm-data)

parameters.name: semester
parameters.description: Term/Termin/semester Autumn 2020 -> 20202, Spring 2020 -> 20201 (year)(1-2)

400.description: Bad Request, something with the request is invalid

404.description: No organization or user matched the Ids

get.summary: Gets a list of used round ids for a semester in a course

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: Course code, six or seven characters

parameters.name: semester
parameters.description: Term/Termin/semester Autumn 2020 -> 20202, Spring 2020 -> 20201 (year)(1-2)

get.summary: Gets a list of used round ids for a semester in a course

parameters.name: courseCode
parameters.description: Course code, six or seven characters

id.description: Unique identifier representing some specific data

courseCode.description: Course code for which it is valid

miniMemos.description: memos listed by semester and in a mini version

courseCode.description: Course code for which it is valid

courseMemoFileName.description: Name of this course memo pdf file in storage (only for pdf-based), usually a string of course offerings names

ladokRoundIds.description: List of round ids (course offerings), including renamed koppsRoundIds if it is a pdf or ladokRoundsIds if it is web-based, that have been used for a course semester

semester.description: f.e., if it is an autumn 2020: 20202, if it is a spring 2020: 20201

memoCommonLangAbbr.description: Language of this course memo (only for web-based)

memoName.description: Name of this course memo (only for web-based), usually a string of course offerings names

isPdf.description: Is it a pdf or web-based memo?

version.description: Version of this course memo (only for web-based)

lastChangeDate.description: Date and time for last change of this memo (only for web-based)

usedRoundsThisSemester.description: List of round ids that have been used for a course semester

publishedWithNoActiveDraft.description: List of latest published memos which do not have an active draft which user can edit

draftsOfPublishedMemos.description: List of latest published memos which have an active draft which user can edit

draftsWithNoActivePublishedVer.description: List of draft memos, endpoint, id

_id.description: Unique identifier representing some specific data

courseCode.description: Course code for which it is valid

_id.description: Unique identifier representing some specific data

courseCode.description: Course code for which it is valid

koppsRoundId.description: List of round id:s for which memo is valid (kurstillfälle)

changedAfterPublishedDate.description: Date for changes made after published???

_id.description: Unique identifier specific for this object so it can be used to delete a draft

courseCode.description: Course code for which it is valid

courseTitle.description: Course name with credits and credit units for which it is valid

lastChangeDate.description: Date and time for last change, set by API

lastPublishedVersionPublishDate.description: Date and time for last published version, set by API

memoCommonLangAbbr.description: Memo language based on common languageOfInstructions for all rounds, 'sv' or 'en'

memoEndPoint.description: memoEndPoint is used to keep all versions under the same endpoint, unique for memo for one kursomgång. Unchangeable enpoint to display it in url (for bookmarks) and keep track on versions change

memoName.description: Changeable name for course memo based on course offering name and semester

semester.description: Course start term year (spring(VT)-1, autumn(HT)-2) , f.e. 20182 or 20181 (termin)

status.description: By default will be set to 'draft'. Other values: published, old, draft

version.description: Will be set by api, it will be incremented for copied draft

additionalRegulations.description: Text field for html with Additional regulations / Övriga föreskrifter (kopps kursplan)

commentAboutMadeChanges.description: Text field to describe what changes have been made to new version of published memo

communicationDuringCourse.description: Text field for html with Communication during course / Kommunikation i kursen (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

courseContent.description: Text field for html with course content/ Kursinnehåll (kopps kursplan)

courseCoordinator.description: Text field for html with Course coordinator  / Kursansvarig (admin via kopps, fetched from redis-ug)

ethicalApproach.description: Text field for html with Ethical approach / Etiskt förhållningssätt (kopps kursplan)

ethicalApproachSubSection.description: Text field for html with Course specific regulations for ethical approach / Kursspecifika regler för etiskt förhållningssätt (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

examination.description: Text field for html with Ethical approach / Etiskt förhållningssätt (kopps kursplan)

examinationSubSection.description: Text field for html with examination Modules / examination Moduler (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

examiner.description: Text field for html with Examinator / Examinator (admin via kopps, fetched from redis-ug)

extraHeaders1.description: Text field for html with extraHeaders / Egna Rubriker för Innehål och lärandemål

extraHeaders2.description: Text field for html with extraHeaders / Egna Rubriker för Förbereda inför kursstart

extraHeaders3.description: Text field for html with extraHeaders / Egna Rubriker för Examination

extraHeaders4.description: Text field for html with extraHeaders / Egna Rubriker för Ytterligare Information

equipment.description: Text field for html with Equipment / Utrustning (kopps kursinformation)

gradingCriteria.description: Text field for html with Grading Criteria / Målrelaterade betygskriterier / (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

gradingScale.description: Text field for html with Grading scale / Betygsskala (kopps kursplan)

infoForReregisteredStudents.description: Text field for html with Information for re-registered students / Information till omregistrerade studenter (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

ladokRoundIds.memoEndPoint: Course round offerings included in one kursomgång(round) for which memo is created

languageOfInstructions.description: Memo language: Svenska, Swedish, Engelska, English ...

learningActivities.description: Text field for html with Learning activities / Läraktiviteter (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

learningOutcomes.description: Text field for html with Intended learning outcomes / Lärandemål (kopps kursplan)

literature.description: Text field for html with Literature / Kurslitteratur (kopps kursinformation)

otherContacts.description: Text field for html with other Contacts like Lab supervisors / Labbhandledare (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

otherRequirementsForFinalGrade.description: Text field for html with Other requirements for final grade / Övriga krav för slutbetyg (kopps kursplan)

permanentDisability.description: Text field for html with Permanent Disability / Funktionsnedsättning (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

permanentDisabilitySubSection.description: Text field for html subsection with Permanent Disability / Funktionsnedsättning (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

possibilityToAddition.description: Text field for html with Opportunity to raise an approved grade via renewed examination / Möjlighet till plussning (kopps kursinformation)

possibilityToCompletion.description: Text field for html with Opportunity to complete the requirements via supplementary examination / Möjlighet till komplettering (kopps kursinformation)

possibilityToCompensate.description: Text field for html with Opportunity to compensate / Möjlighet till ersättningsuppgifter (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

preparations.description: Text field for html with Preparations / Förbereda inför kursstart (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

prerequisites.description: Text field for html with Prerequisites / Rekommenderade förkunskaper (kopps kursinformation)

reportingResults.description: Text field for html with Results reporting / Resultatrapportering (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

scheduleDetails.description: Text field for html with Schedule details / Detaljschema / (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

software.description: Text field for html with Software / Programvara (KIP - via kurs pm admin)

syllabusValid.description: Syllabus valit from term in digital and text form

teacher.description: Text field for html with  Teacher / Lärare (admin via kopps, fetched from redis-ug)

teacherAssistants.description: Text field for html with Teacher assistants / Lärarassistenter (admin via kopps, fetched from redis-ug)
